title: Leaving the Wire: An Infantryman's Iraq
description: This book paints an intense, graphic portrait of the emotional and physical realities of the counter-insurgency campaign in Iraq. Gain insight into the murky characteristics that defined the war from a grunt who lived through it; the drudgery, filth, confusion, fear, and frustration. If youâ€™ve ever wondered what it was like to be there, this book is for you.
author: David P. Ervin
